thread.title: Christine
thread.title_full: HiFX New Zealand reviewed by Christine

author: Christine
title: Christine
text: It was easy to understand the worker: he used my simple language whilst dealing with high finance... for me, just getting some Â£ sent over to live on... for him, maybe, but not obvious, adapting to my requests by leaving his usual kind of clients wait a while. Thank you . It is important to me to feel listened to in this fickle business of dosh. Good deals, in a poor ( as in rates) time.Better than another company I had just signed up with and a couple on NZ banks.
